title: Anton Antipov
text:
Anton Valeryevich Antipov (; born 20 April 1990) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a>.
Career.
Antipov made his professional debut for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a> on 17 July 2011 in the <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Vladimir">FC Torpedo Vladimir</a>. He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for Spartak Nalchik on 11 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
